object.name: AffiliateInfo
object.description: Contains information about the affiliate that received a commission via this transaction.
object.html_description: Contains information about the affiliate that received a commission via this transaction.
object.rst_description: Contains information about the affiliate that received a commission via this transaction.

annotations.description: The bot or the user that received an affiliate commission if it was received by a bot or a user
annotations.html_description: Optional. The bot or the user that received an affiliate commission if it was received by a bot or a user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The bot or the user that received an affiliate commission if it was received by a bot or a user
annotations.name: affiliate_user

annotations.description: The chat that received an affiliate commission if it was received by a chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. The chat that received an affiliate commission if it was received by a chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The chat that received an affiliate commission if it was received by a chat
annotations.name: affiliate_chat

annotations.description: The number of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate for each 1000 Telegram Stars received by the bot from referred users
annotations.html_description: The number of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate for each 1000 Telegram Stars received by the bot from referred users
annotations.rst_description: The number of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate for each 1000 Telegram Stars received by the bot from referred users
annotations.name: commission_per_mille

annotations.description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate from the transaction, rounded to 0; can be negative for refunds
annotations.html_description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate from the transaction, rounded to 0; can be negative for refunds
annotations.rst_description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate from the transaction, rounded to 0; can be negative for refunds
annotations.name: amount

annotations.description: The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate; from -999999999 to 999999999; can be negative for refunds
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate; from -999999999 to 999999999; can be negative for refunds
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate; from -999999999 to 999999999; can be negative for refunds
annotations.name: nanostar_amount
